name: VoteWatch Europe AISBL
goal: VoteWatch Europe AISBL is a non-partisan, not-for-profit organisation. Its goal is to provide better insight into EU politics by providing data and fact-based analysis on decision-making by the European Parliament and the Council of Ministers. We make this available in a user-friendly format that can be easily accessed and digested by citizens, the media, NGOs, the private sector and anyone else interested in EU affairs. VoteWatch Europe believes that by making it easier for citizens and stakeholders to follow the activities of the EU's legislative bodies, they will gain a better understanding of, and greater interest in, how EU politics affects their daily lives.
euInitiatives: We follow horizontally the work of the EP, reporting on the main debates and votes cast in the plenary.
